item.title: Our thoughts are not free
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: Opposite to the traditional German folk song “Die Gedanken sind frei” (All thoughts are free) I claim otherwise. Based on an insight from deep meditation I will try to explain this in strictly logical terms, giving examples and scientific evidence.
